<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Cultist](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=418)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

You were (or still are) a member of a cult whose rites may involve sacred dances to ensure a strong harvest or dire rituals that call upon dark powers. You might have taken up adventuring to further your cult’s aims, to initiate yourself into the world’s grander mysteries, or to flee unsavory practices or strictures.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) skill, and a [Lore](/skills/lore) skill related to your deity or cult. You gain the [Schooled in Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=2148) skill feat.
